meanings.definition: The act of making something legal.
meanings.sent1: The legalizations of certain drugs have sparked debates across the country.
meanings.sent2: The recent legalizations of same-sex marriage have brought joy to many couples.
meanings.sent3: After the legalization of jaywalking, pedestrians felt like rebels without a cause.
meanings.sent4: The legalization of online gambling opened up a whole new world of opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The legalizations of new traffic laws made the streets safer for everyone.

meanings.definition: The process of officially allowing something that was previously prohibited.
meanings.sent1: The legalizations of certain activities have boosted the economy.
meanings.sent2: The legalization of cannabis has led to new business opportunities.
meanings.sent3: The legalization of fireworks made the Fourth of July celebrations even more exciting.
meanings.sent4: The legalizations of new technologies have revolutionized the way we live.
meanings.sent5: The legalizations of street vendors added a vibrant atmosphere to the city.
